original_title: Court order issued preventing protests inconveniencing the public
original_body_lines: Fort Magistrate’s Court has issued an order preventing the Inter-University Students’ Federation (IUSF) convenor and 12 others from holding protests while inconveniencing pedestrians and vehicular movement today (June 07), the police said.
The order also prevents the protesters from entering the President’s Office, the President’s House, the Finance Ministry and the Galle Face area, according to the police.
